long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UI Utilities is a simple and fast plugin for finding and selecting colors on the page, and creating screen grabs that you can download or copy.

Search and preview page colors

* Show a magnified preview of the page that you can move around
* View and copy the selected hex code to use elsewhere
* Past copied colors are automatically archived for easy reuse
* Use arrow keys to increment the preview for precise selecting

Create screengrabs from the page

* Drag a box over any part of the visible web page and get its dimensions
* Copy or save the selected area as an image to your computer
* Easily drag and resize the box for a more precise placement
* See the pixel dimensions at any point, and copy it to the clipboard

Regarding privacy:

Google analytics is used to track the usage of specific features (ie, popularity of screen grabs vs color picker). No personally identifiable information from the user is collected; no information at all about the page or what you copy - screen captures, saved colors, etc. - is collected.
